questions.question: Which rendering method is supported by Next.js?
What is the file-based routing in Next.js?
options: Pages are automatically routed based on their file name in the pages directory
Routes must be defined in a central configuration file
Routes are defined using a special routing component
Routes are defined in the server configuration
questions.answer: Pages are automatically routed based on their file name in the pages directory

questions.question: What is the purpose of getStaticProps in Next.js?
options: To fetch data at build time
To fetch data on every request
questions.answer: To fetch data at build time

questions.question: Which directory is used for API routes in Next.js?
